requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, or Windows 10+
  • Processor: ntel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 270X (or equivalent with at least 4 GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
